titleStmt.title: A judicious speech made by the Right Honourable the Lord Kimbolton, in Parliament, Ianuary 3, 1641 concerning the articles of high treason exhibited against his Lordship, Sir Arthur Haslerig, M. Pym, M. Stroud, M. Hollis, and M. Hampden, by His Majesty ...
Speech in Parliament Jan. 3, 1641, concerning the articles of high treason exhibited against him
titleStmt.author: Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.

titleStmt.title: A judicious speech made by the Right Honourable the Lord Kimbolton, in Parliament, Ianuary 3, 1641 concerning the articles of high treason exhibited against his Lordship, Sir Arthur Haslerig, M. Pym, M. Stroud, M. Hollis, and M. Hampden, by His Majesty ...
Speech in Parliament Jan. 3, 1641, concerning the articles of high treason exhibited against him
titleStmt.author: Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.

notesStmt.note: Perhaps a forgery. Cf. Thomason Coll.
Edward Montagu, Earl of Manchester is Lord Kimbolton.
Also published in 1642 as: The Right Honourable the Lord Kimbolton his speech in Parliament, on Tuesday the third of January 1641 [i.e. 1642].
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
